title: Sentence Classification with Transformers
description: We'll use The Corpus of Linguistic Acceptability (CoLA) dataset for single sentence classification. It's a set of sentences labeled as grammatically correct or incorrect. It was first published in May of 2018, and is one of the tests included in the "GLUE Benchmark" on which models like BERT are competing.
